an5.102:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ussankitaparisankito hoti papabhikkhuti api akuppadhammopi.
an5.102:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vesiyagocaro va hoti, vidhavagocaro va hoti, thullakumarikagocaro va hoti, pandakagocaro va hoti, bhikkhunigocaro va hoti.
an5.102:3.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ussankitaparisankito hoti papabhikkhuti api akuppadhammopi”ti.
